title: Unstable
description: It’s finally my time…I am an outlaw.The proud right-hand man to the president in the Unacceptables MC.I wasn’t prepared for the curveball life was about to throw at me. But if there is one thing I have learned from being in my organization: you have to be ready for anything.When Ryder showed up on my doorstep, I wasn’t sure if I could handle it. I didn’t know how to be a father. I am Holt Walsh, and this is my story.
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
